description: This file defines functions for interacting with a song API, including listing songs, uploading a song, and retrieving a stream URL for a specific song.

methods.name: listSongs({ token })
methods.description: Fetches user's songs from the backend API endpoint GET /songs.

methods.name: uploadSong({ token, file, title, artist })
methods.description: Uploads an mp3 file, optionally with title and artist, to the backend API endpoint POST /songs/upload.

methods.name: getSongStreamUrl({ songId })
methods.description: Returns the stream URL for a given song ID.

ctags.name: uploadSong
ctags.pattern: /^export async function uploadSong({ token, file, title, artist }) {$/
